channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Access Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Access Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-4151|2024-09-16T19:40:00.913Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 158512.

item.title: CVE-2020-4661|2024-09-16T17:38:55.445Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.7 and IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive using timing side channel attacks which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 186142.

item.title: CVE-2019-4135|2024-09-16T21:02:23.505Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 is affected by a security vulnerability that could allow authenticated users to impersonate other users. IBM X-Force ID: 158331.

item.title: CVE-2019-4158|2024-09-16T20:22:39.265Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 does not prove that a user's identity is correct which can lead to the exposure of resources or functionality to unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 158574.

item.title: CVE-2019-4157|2024-09-16T17:17:40.379Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158573.

item.title: CVE-2017-1533|2024-09-16T17:38:41.574Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 130675.

item.title: CVE-2020-4699|2024-09-16T20:16:56.855Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.7 and IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive using timing side channel attacks which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 186947.

item.title: CVE-2019-4156|2024-09-16T19:20:32.434Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 158572.

item.title: CVE-2018-1443|2024-09-16T19:01:09.668Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: An XML parsing vulnerability affects IBM SAML-based single sign-on (SSO) systems (IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.0 - 9.0.4 and IBM Tivoli Federated Identity Manager 6.2 - 6.0.2.) This vulnerability can allow an attacker with authenticated access to trick SAML systems into authenticating as a different user without knowledge of the victim users password. IBM X-Force ID: 139754.

item.title: CVE-2019-4152|2024-09-16T19:10:50.464Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 9.0.1 through 9.0.6 does not invalidate session tokens in a timely manner. The lack of proper session expiration may allow attackers with local access to login into a closed browser session. IBM X-Force ID: 158515.
